DOC.brief_summary: Each patient is preoperatively treated once profylactic with intraveneous antibiotics. Postoperatively, one group will be treated with intraveneous antibiotics during 5 days. The other group will receive no antibiotics.
DOC.brief_title: Does it Make Sense to Give Postoperative Antibiotics to Patients With an Uncomplicated Acute Cholecystitis
DOC.criteria: Uncomplicated acute cholecystitis < 5 days(confirmed by echography and blood sample) > 18 years old
